intro: I'm a Computer Science Technology student at Vanier College, actively seeking part-time opportunities. I'm passionate about software engineering and plan to pursue a degree in Software Engineering at Concordia or McGill University after graduation.
cs50_cert: I have completed the prestigious Harvard CS50 course. You can view my certificate here.
field_tech_desc: I interned as a Field Service Technician at the Ministry of Defence, providing IT support across Quebec. I resolved hardware and software issues, managed backups, and offered technical training. Additionally, I contributed to IT asset acquisition and lifecycle management.
cashier_desc: I prioritize customer care by providing friendly and attentive service to foster loyalty. Additionally, I maintain a clean and inviting dining area, ensuring A&W's operational standards are met.
usher_desc: I previously held the position of a cinema usher, where my duties encompassed seating patrons, ensuring post-screening cleanliness, and occasionally managing concessions, including beverages and popcorn.
project1_desc: My GitHub repository 'Finance-CS50-Project' features a financial application I developed for the CS50 course, including user authentication, stock trading, and portfolio management.
